## Description {#details}

Struct that represents (part of) either a return value or a function argument.

Used so that arguments and return values can be used interchangeably.

Definition at line 44 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/deadargumentelimination-h">DeadArgumentElimination.h</a>.
